body_html: That explanation helps. Sounds like you would want to add the collections a variable belongs to as an entry in the attr map in the NodeDef for a variable node so that that information is saved for every node in the graph definition proto. Then the graph visualizer can use that information to add a collections list to the tf_node_info info card for any selected variable.

body: That explanation helps. Sounds like you would want to add the collections a variable belongs to as an entry in the attr map in the NodeDef for a variable node so that that information is saved for every node in the graph definition proto. Then the graph visualizer can use that information to add a collections list to the tf_node_info info card for any selected variable.
